summary: In mourning over the tragic drowning of their daughter Sarah, James and Adèle are visited by Ebrill, a young girl who claims she died 60 years ago - and bears a startling resemblance to Sarah.
cast: Maria Bello|Sean Bean|Maurice Roëves|Sophie Stuckey|Abigail Stone|Richard Elfyn|Casper Harvey|Eluned Jones|Gwenyth Petty|Robin Griffith|Mike Keggen|Tonya Smith|Luke Kearney
keywords: drowning|psychotronic film|trepanning|possessed by evil|mother sacrifices herself to save daughter
title: The Dark
